item.title: Four Tips for Getting More Work Done While Traveling
item.description: Staying productive during traveling can sometimes be a challenge. There are some things you can do to make the most out of your transit times and get more work done. Knomoâ€”a UK based company that makes bags for digital nomads and techies like us, asked me to share some tips for staying productive while traveling. I shared four of the most important ones. I hope you find them useful! I will be sharing many more in another blog post too, so stay tuned!
